description_expanded: Sitvon 10 Pint Energy Star Dehumidifier is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home appliances. A compact and quiet 10-pint dehumidifier for areas up to 2,000 sq. ft. Features a timer, auto-shutoff, continuous drain hose option, and Energy Star certification. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
